<<<<<<< HEAD
Two orientall pearles, grace and glory, published by Mr. Zacharie Boyd, preacher of Gods word, at Glasgovv Boyd, Zacharie, 1585?-1653.
50, [2]+ p.
Printed by Iohn Wreittoun, Edinburgh : 1629.
Three sermons, on Psalm lxxii, 24, 25, and 26. Title from British Library copy (beginning-page 15 spliced at end of film). Signatures: A-C D² E-K L² . Imperfect: Title page and all after page following page 50 lacking. Reproduction of the original in the University of Edinburgh Library.
=======
